content.question: Consider a hypothesis test in which the significance level is <math alttext="alpha equals 0.05" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Î±</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and the probability of a Type <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>II</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> error is 0.18. What is the power of the test?

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
